content:
WELCOME TO PARADISE

Hop on a scooter, bike or our downtown shuttle and head to Mallory Square for the island's famous sunset celebration. Find a party, bar or live music performance and lose yourself on Duval Street. Stroll the quiet lanes of Key West's subdued residential neighborhoods in search of architectural splendor and a sense of peace. Enjoy a sun-splashed afternoon on the beautiful beaches of Fort Zachary Taylor State Park. All of this and more is within reach at The Gates of Key West.
